juzs.text: Ja ili do gxi trov out
plej assuredly ili do gxi trov out
Ni kre dorm tial vi ripoz
Tag korn blov vi ven en throngs
Mont removed as ili est mirage
Por transgressors; gxi est their abode
Ili neniam gust gxi coolness nor drink
Sufer consequences; ni nur increase your retribution
Ili neniam auxd gxi any nonsense mensog
Rekompenc el your Lord generous recompense
Lord de heavens ter cxio them. Plej Gracious. Ne 1 abrogate His decisions
Tag ven when Spirit angxel star rem! Neniom parol those permes per plej Gracious ili utter nur ki est dekstr
Such est inevitable tag. Whoever vol let him pren rifugx his Lord
Ni suficx avert vi imminent retribution. Ke est tag when everyone ekzamen ki his man send for disbeliever dir Oh Mi wish mi est polv
Kaj those gently pren (anim believers) joyfully
Kiel this okaz post ni did hav torn into rotten ost
Ili dir This est impossible recurrence
His Lord vok him holy val Tuwaa
Let me direkt vi al your Lord ti vi torn reverent
Li tiam montr him great mirakl
Tiam li torn en a hurry
Li dir mi est your Lord alt
Consequently DI committed him al retribution Hereafter ankaux as en 1 life
This est lecion por des reverent
Vi est difficult kre than heaven? Li konstru gxi
Li raised its mes perfekt gxi
Li far its nokt dark brightened its morn
El gxi, Li produkt its own akv pasxt
All this al proviz life support vi your best
Ke est tag when human vol memor cxio li did
As por 1 who reverenced majesty his Lord enjoined sin el sinful lusts
Ili pet vi pri Hor when gxi sorb met
Ne est vi (Muhammad) destin anonc its temp
Your misi est avert those expect gxi
Tag ili seg ili sent as ili last 1 ecx half tag
Li sorb heed benefit el message
Eben kvankam vi ne garanti his salvation
Ve al human est li est tial unappreciative
El tiny gut Li kre him desegn him
Tiam Li puts him death into grave
When Li vol Li resurrects him
Al proviz life support vi your best
Ke est tag when unu flees his frat
Each unu de them sur ke tag worries his own destiny
Kelk vizagx ke tag est felicx
Ali vizagx ti tag kovr mizer
Cxiu anim kon cxio gxi brought
Li est hold dors any news
Gxi ne est talk rejected diabl
Whatever vi do gxi est en accordance kun vol DI Lord univers
Cxiu anim testament trov out ki kauxz gxi advance ki kauxz gxi regress
O vi human est ki diverted vi el your Lord Honorable
Unu kre vi desegn vi perfekt vi
En whatever desegn Li chose Li konstru gxi
Oblivious al ti tie est (invisible) keepers vi
Ke est tag when ne anim help another anim all decisions ke tag vol aparten al DI
Who postul plen mezur when ricev popol
when don them mezur weights ili cheat
Ili ne kon ti ili resurrected
Ke est tag when all popol star Lord univers
Ja libr de wicked est Sijjeen
Vi kon ki Sijjeen Do est
Ili ne kred en Tag Judgment
Neniom disbelieves therein transgressor des sinful
When our revelations recited him li dir Tales el preter
Ja their kor igx sxild their pek
Ja ili izol ke tag their Lord
Ili told This est ki vi uz deny
Vi recognize their vizagx joy bliss
Its spic est musk. This est ki competitors kondur por
wicked uz rid je those kred
When ili pas them ili uz poke fun
When ili got together their popol ili uz sxerc
Whenever ili seg them ili dir These popol est far astray
Ili ne hav such ajx (invisible) gard
plej assuredly disbelievers requited ki ili did
Gxi eject its kontent gxi erupts
O humans vi est irreversibly rubrik por meeting your Lord
As por 1 who ricev his record his dekstr man
As por 1 who ricev his record behind his dors
Li uz akt arrogantly his popol
Li opini li neniam est vok kont
jes ja his Lord est Seer de him
Kaj when Quran recited them ili ne fal prostrate
DI est fully aware da their innermost thoughts
As por those kred plumb righteous life ili ricev recompense est well-deserved
Ili hated them ne ali raci than kred en DI Almighty des Praiseworthy
Al Him aparten kingship de heavens ter! Di witnesses all ajx
Surely those persekut kred hom women tiam fail pent incurred retribution Gehenna; ili incurred retribution de brul
Surely those kred plumb righteous life ind gxarden flu streams This est greatest triumf
Ja your Lord's blov est severe
Li est Unu who iniciat ripet
DI est fully aware da them
Vi kon ki Al-Taareq Do est
Li est certainly able al resurrect him
Li ne hav potenc nor helper
Glor nom your Lord plej Alt
Cxio est en accordance kun di testament Li kon ki deklar ki kasx
Do vi remind; perhaps reminder benefit
Wherein li neniam mort nor rest alive
Successful ja est unu redeems his anim
Per memor nom his Lord observ kontakt prayers (Salat)
Eben kvankam Hereafter est far put everlasting
Est vi aware da des Overwhelming
Ili ne hav food useless variety
Gxi neniam nutr nor sat hunger
Ali vizagx tag vol est plen da joy
En gxi tie est luxurious furnishings
Why ili ne reflect kamel kaj kiel ili kre
Kaj cxiel kaj kiel gxi raised
Kaj mont kaj kiel ili konstru
Kaj ter kaj kiel gxi cxarpent
Vi remind your misi est liver this reminder
DI testament commit them AL great retribution
Al us est their ultimate destiny
Vi not ki your Lord hav did al ‘Aad
Ankaux Thamoud carved rok their val
Consequently your Lord versx them vip retribution
When human est tested his Lord blessings joy li dir My Lord est generous towards me
Li tests him reduction provisions li dir My Lord humiliating me
Wrong est vi brought gxi yourselves per ne regarding orf
Ja when ter crushed utterly crushed
your Lord ven together angxel en vic post vic
Ke tag Gehenna brought for. Ke tag human est memor - Sed ki remembrance - Gxi est tro late
Li dir Oh Mi wish mi prepar my (etern) life
Ke tag ne retribution est mav than His retribution
Neni confinement est as effective as His confinement
As por vi O kontent anim
Return al your Lord placx placx
Ni kre human est work hard redeem
Li opini ke ne 1 Does ever vok him kont
Li fanfaron mi spent tial mult mon
Li opini ne 1 Does vid him
Est 1 de those kred, exhorting 1 another est steadfast exhorting 1 another est kind
As por those disbelieved our revelations ili incurred mizer
Tiam montr gxi ki est evil ki est bon
Di messenger dir al them This est di kamel; let her drink
Ili disbelieved him bucx her! Their Lord tiam requited them por their pek annihilated them
sed those who ven post them ceter heedless
Your works est de various kinds
As por him don charity argument righteousness
Li who est stingy li est ricx
His mon ne help him when li fal
Ni control Hereafter tro this life
Neniom brul therein escept des wicked
Streb nur his Lord plej Alt
Your Lord neniam abandoned vi nor did Li forges
Hereafter est far put por vi than this 1 (life)
your Lord don vi suficx vi placx
Li ne trov vi orf Li Did don vi hejm
Li trov vi astray direkt vi
Li trov vi poor far vi ricx
Vi proklam ben your Lord bestowed vi
Ja kun pain tie est gajn
Tiam torn him into lowliest de des lowly
those who kred plumb righteous life; ili ricev rekompenc put ind
est DI ne plej Sagx de all sagx unu
Li instru hom ki li neniam kon
Al your Lord est ultimate destiny
Gxi est bon him sekv guidance
Li ne realize ti DI Does seg
Ja unless li refrains ni pren him forelock
Let him tiam vok sur his helpers
Vi ne obe him; vi auxtun prostrate draw cxi
Nokt Destiny est put than 1000 monat
Angxel Spirit descend therein their Lord's las port cxiu ordon
Those disbelieved among des popol de scripture tro as idol worshipers insist their voj proof don them
messenger el DI reciting them sankt instrukci
En them tie est valuable teachings
En fakt, those ricev scripture ne disput proof don them
All pet de them est worship DI devoting religi absolutely Him sol observ kontakt prayers (Salat) don obligatory charity (Zakat)! Such est perfekt religi
Those disbelieved among des popol de scripture idol worshipers incurred fajr Gehenna forever Ili est mav creatures
Those kred plumb righteous life est bon creatures
Their rekompenc their Lord est gxarden Eden flu streams wherein ili abide forever DI PLACX them ILI PLACX Him! Such est rekompenc those reverence their Lord
human vol wonder Ki est okaz
Ke tag gxi tell its news
Ke tag popol issue cxiu direction montr their works
Whoever does atom weight bon vol seg gxi
whoever does atom weight evil vol seg gxi
human est est unappreciative de his Lord
Li ne realize ti tag ven when graves Does opened
Ili do gxi trov out, ke tag their Lord est fully Cognizant de them
Vi Do any ide ki Shocker hav est
Ke est tag when popol ven swarms papili
As por him weights est heavy
As por him weights est light
Vi kon ki gxi Do est
Ja vi do gxi trov out
plej assuredly vi do gxi trov out
Se nur vi could trov out por cert
Tiam vi seg gxi okul certainty
Tiam vi questioned ke tag blessings vi gxu
those who kred plumb righteous life exhort 1 another uphold truth exhort 1 another est steadfast
As se his mon far him immortal
Vi kon ki Devastator Do est
Vi not ki your Lord hav did al popol elefant
Li ne kauxz their schemes Did backfire
Li far them like macx fojn
Voj ili cherish karavan de vintr somer
Li est Unu fed them hunger proviz them security post tim
Vi kon who Do really rejects faith
Kaj ve al those observ kontakt prayers (Salat)
who est totally heedless de their prayers
Do vi pregx your Lord (Salat) don charity
Mi ne worship ki vi worship
Nor do vi worship ki mi worship
Nor vol mi ever worship ki vi worship
Nor vol vi ever worship ki mi worship
Al vi est your religi me est my religi
Vi seg popol embracing di religi en throngs
Vi glor lauxd your Lord implore Him por forgiveness! Li est Redeemer
kondamn est works de Abee Lahab li kondamn
His mon whatever li accomplished neniam help him
Sxi resurrected sxnur dorn her kol
Neniam did Li beget. Nor Li begotten
Dir mi streb rifugx Lord daybreak
El evils de envious when ili envi
dir mi streb rifugx Lord popol
